scripts.init: pnpm install && pnpm run prisma:db-push && pnpm run seed
scripts.liturgical:init: (git submodule status vendor/divinum-officium >/dev/null 2>&1 || git submodule add https://github.com/DivinumOfficium/divinum-officium.git vendor/divinum-officium) && git submodule update --init vendor/divinum-officium && git -C vendor/divinum-officium sparse-checkout init --cone && git -C vendor/divinum-officium sparse-checkout set web/www web/cgi-bin
scripts.liturgical:update: git submodule update --remote --init vendor/divinum-officium && git -C vendor/divinum-officium sparse-checkout set web/www web/cgi-bin
